lead_paragraph: Australian Bernard Tomic courted controversy yet again when he fired lewd comments toward a heckler at the U.S. Open during his first-round upset loss to Bosnia's Damir Dzumhur on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Tomic Courts Controversy Again With Lewd Rant at Heckler
headline.main: Tomic Courts Controversy Again With Lewd Rant at Heckler

snippet: Australian Bernard Tomic courted controversy yet again when he fired lewd comments toward a heckler at the U.S. Open during his first-round upset loss to Bosnia's Damir Dzumhur on Tuesday....
